member.name: T:Tolgyp.lang.Language
member.summary: Provides functionality to detect the language of a given text and translate it, primarily between Polish and English, using the Google Cloud Translation V2 API. It includes both synchronous and asynchronous methods for these operations. Note: The is currently re-initialized on each detection call, which might be inefficient for frequent operations.

member.name: P:Tolgyp.lang.Language.LanguageCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the language code for the detected language.

member.name: P:Tolgyp.lang.Language.LanguageTranslateCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the language code for the translation.

member.name: P:Tolgyp.lang.Language.Detection
member.summary: Gets the detected language and its confidence.

member.name: P:Tolgyp.lang.Language.OrginalText
member.summary: Gets the original text and translated text.

member.name: M:Tolgyp.lang.Language.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The is initialized on demand when detection methods are called.

member.name: M:Tolgyp.lang.Language.Translate(System.String)
member.summary: Detects the language of the input text and translates it to the complementary language (Polish to English, or any other detected language to Polish). If the detected language is "pl", it translates to "en". Otherwise, it translates to "pl".
member.returns: The translated text. Returns an error message string if detection or client is null, or translation fails.

member.name: M:Tolgyp.lang.Language.TranslateAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously detects the language of the input text and translates it to the complementary language (Polish to English, or any other detected language to Polish). If the detected language is "pl", it translates to "en". Otherwise, it translates to "pl".
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the translated text. Returns an error message string if detection or client is null, or translation fails.

member.name: M:Tolgyp.lang.Language.DetectLanguage(System.String)
member.summary: Detects the language of the provided text using the Google Cloud Translation V2 API. The result of the detection (language code and confidence) is stored internally in the field. This method also initializes the field with a new . Any exceptions during detection are caught, logged to "error.log", and printed to the console.
member.param: The text whose language needs to be detected.

member.name: M:Tolgyp.lang.Language.DetectLanguageAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously detects the language of the provided text using the Google Cloud Translation V2 API. The result of the detection (language code and confidence) is stored internally in the field. This method also initializes the field with a new asynchronously. Any exceptions during detection are caught, logged to "error.log", and printed to the console.
member.param: The text whose language needs to be detected.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous detection operation.
